Gold futures surge above $2,400 amid economic anticipation
sample_text: Gold futures rebounded strongly on Tuesday, with the most active August contract reclaiming the $2,400 per ounce mark as traders positioned themselves ahead of crucial economic data releases. This resurgence follows Monday's retreat, which saw gold settle at $2,394.70, just shy of the psychologically significant $2,400 mark.
